reviewText: The Hill Have Size is about a neglected housewife , Kasumi , and her husbands cousin and houseguest , Ryoji . The story is solid . The characters are great , Kasumi is kind and demure and accepts her life even though the affection and appreciation from her husband is non existant . Ryoji , after seeing Kasumi naked , bottles up his feelings towards her and bears the burden , not wanting to betray his cousin and possibly wreck their family .Then comes the fateful night when the husband returns home after a prolonged absence , after an evening of drinking the husband goes to bed leaving Kasumi in a lurch again. Ryoji , drunk and on his way to the restroom hears Kasumi , also drunk , voicing her frustrations of feeling unwanted , and the enevitable happens .Like I said the story is solid , you can almost feel the guilt afterword , the pair wanting each other but not wanting to hurt the ones they care for .There's not a lot of hentai , a couple of scenes per episode , but it's there and not that softcore stuff. The characters are well drawn ( other than Kasumi's freakishly huge bosom ) and the story well done . I wish there were more eps , I would like to find out what happened to the characters after this series.

reviewText: I bought this item recently and was surprised by the story seeing as I've never watched it before. The animation is great throughout the entire series. And simply the plot is like this...Ryoji has always been like a brother to his cousin, but all that changes when Ryoji witnesses his cousin's wife pleasuring herself one night. Then the next day, Ryoji walks in on Kasumi in the shower. Unable to get the image of Kasumi's massive breasts & her masturbation out of his mind, Ryoji makes it his mission to satisfy the unfulfilled woman. However, Kasumi's sister, Harumi, and Kasumi's own daughter, Mio, have their own plans for Ryoji...Also the english dub was okay but the japanese was so much better. I prefer japanese over english dub especially when it comes to H-series. But anyway that's just myself sometimes I do come across good english dubs.
